content.question: Which of the following best explains how the change described by the author affects policy making in Mexico?

choices.label: Greater competition among groups may lead to inconsistent policy making at times.
Businesses will become more involved with developing national economic policies.
Policy making among government officials will become more consensual but less transparent.
Interest groups will have more stable and predictable relationships with the government.

content.answer: Greater competition among groups may lead to inconsistent policy making at times.
